data.title: Online & VR Skilled Trades Training
data.meta_description: Interplay Learning offers comprehensive, 3D and sim-based skilled trades training. Learn more about how our online courses help level up your techs' skills.
data.text:
Build Skills Faster!

Get workers job-ready faster and easier than ever before with SkillMill, the world leader in always-on immersive skilled trades training.

Close the Skills Gap

Faster Make anyone job-ready in weeks, not years, to accelerate their trades career success.

Easier Avoid the time and effort of sustaining a trades training program so you can focus on your business and mission.

Better Keep learners engaged and improving to ensure successful trades training outcomes.

> New Video!

Meta and Interplay Learning: Quest for Purpose

We’ve partnered with Meta to showcase how our hands-on VR training is making a difference in the real world. Click to watch our latest story.

Solutions For

Small and Midsize Businesses

Mid Florida Heating and Air Turns New Hires Profitable in 90 Days

Save Time, Get Results

SkillMill is the world’s leading skilled trades training solution, providing always-on immersive training that creates job-ready skilled trade workers faster and easier than ever before.

Training Wherever Your Team Goes

Don’t compromise on where you allocate your time and resources. Give your entire team the opportunity to expand their knowledge and skills by delivering standardized, scalable training that can be accessed anytime, anywhere — on any device.

The Interplay Learning Approach

Effective

Proven learning methodology makes anyone ready in weeks.

Scalable

Expert, current, always-on training for anywhere, any time skill development.

Engaging

Immersive, fun, and safe environment keeps learners interested and improving.

Testimonials

International Training Institute Brings Innovative Digital Training to More Than 14,000 Building Trades Union Apprentices

“ITI is using Interplay Learning’s technology to attract a new generation of professionals, change the way the workforce thinks about hands-on training and make learning faster and more powerful. Virtual training gives students the ability to see things from a perspective they typically can’t and helps them understand. For example, when you look at an HVAC system with exposed ducts, you have no idea what’s going on inside. With VR, you can now see right inside!”

Lincoln Property Company Deploys Interplay’s Skilled Trades Training Courses and Custom Learning Paths to Upskill, Promote and Retain Their Essential Maintenance Teams.

“Interplay’s courses have served as the critical infrastructure needed to overcome industry-wide retention challenges and is a huge win for our company, maintenance techs, as well as our residents. Our team members now have the tools to empower themselves to improve their careers, which greatly translates to enhanced resident experiences across our portfolio of properties as well,”

Affiliations and Certifications

Get CEUs and prepare for widely-recognized certification exams like EPA 608, OSHA 10, NATE, and more.

Trusted by 1,000+ Companies and 130,000+ Learners
